thread.section_title: NakedWines.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NakedWines.com | us.nakedwines.com
thread.title: Vacuous Blitherer

author: Vacuous Blitherer
title: Vacuous Blitherer
text:
This company is so full of it !!
They send out vouchers to all the states, then when ya try to use them, they give this BS answer:
" As a resident of.. ""your state"" will not permit the use of money off voucher against the purchase of alcohol....However....Would ya like top open an account?""
If that's the case, why bother to try and solicit business when they damn well know if your state allegedly will not accept a money off voucher !!
Be smart....stay away from these hucksters !!
